  • Method Details

    • putResource

      public void putResource​(WarehouseDepots warehouseDepots, int pos) throws PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException
      This method receives the current player warehouse depots and a position in it, then calls addResource on it, passing what type is this marble
      Specified by:
      putResource in class Marble
      Parameters:
      warehouseDepots - : tells the method which player warehouse to use
      pos - : indicates one of the six position in the warehouse
      Throws:
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException - : propagates this exception, generated if the position chosen is already occupied
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException - : propagates this exception, generated if the resource passed is present on a different shelf
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException - : propagates this exception, generated if there are different resources types already placed in the chosen shelf
      IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException - : if you are out of bounds of the WarehouseDepots

    • putResource

      public void putResource​(ExtraStorageLeaderCard leaderCard) throws DifferentStorageException, OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException
      This method receives an already placed leader card of the current player then calls addResource on it, passing what type is this marble
      Specified by:
      putResource in class Marble
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - : tells the method which card of the current player to use
      Throws:
      DifferentStorageException - if the storage passed has a different type of this marble
      OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException - propagates this exception, generated if the leader card slots are full

      This method only throws an exception when accessed by this marble
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
